title: Fu*kboys in Flannel
description: Bennett is calm and cruel.Mason is reckless and rough.I've been a good girl and stayed out of their way,but they’ll do everything in their power to make me dothe one thing I’ve never been able to.Choose between the Slade brothers.They’ll have to k!ll me first.I’ve seen what they're capable of…So they just might.
author: Rory Ireland
